Step 3ï¸âƒ£: Break tasks into manageable chunks ğŸ§©. Large tasks can be overwhelming. Breaking them into smaller tasks makes the overall project seem less daunting and easier to manage. âœ… 

Step 4ï¸âƒ£: Stay organized ğŸ“š. Keep your work space clean and clutter-free. A chaotic work environment can lead to a scattered mind. Allocate specific places for everything and maintain order. ğŸ’¼ 

Step 5ï¸âƒ£: Take regular breaks  ğŸ•°. Studies have shown that taking short breaks can boost productivity and creativity levels. Rather than working for hours on end, aim for intervals of concentrated work followed by a short break. ğŸŒ¸
